evidence.claim: Engage Technologies uses AWS for cloud services including serverless applications with AWS Lambda and data storage in Amazon S3.
The organization processes healthcare data using FHIR standards, ensuring interoperability with EHRs.
Engage Technologies Group implements X12 EDI for healthcare transaction processing, enhancing compatibility with clearinghouses.
The use of PostgreSQL on AWS is highlighted for database needs, suggesting a robust backend infrastructures.

icp.icp_reason: Focus on health tech with X12 EDI integration suggests strong alignment with ICP.
